document_data.mainbody: '''Air  domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[air]]-related [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: The spellcaster gained the ability to turn away and destroy [[:Category:Creatures with the earth subtype|earth creatures]] the way a good cleric [[Turn undead|turned undead]], and to rebuke, command, and strengthen [[:Category:Creatures with the air subtype|air creatures]] the way an evil cleric rebuked undead.
document_data.Spells: As they advanced, a priest with this domain could conjure an ''[[obscuring mist]]'', create a protective ''[[wind wall]]'', give a being a ''[[gaseous form]]'', and to move through the air with ''[[air walk]]''. They could also control the weather, with ''[[control winds]]'' and ''[[control weather]]'', and attack with ''[[chain lightning]]'' and ''[[whirlwind]]''. Finally, they could summon an ''[[elemental swarm]]'' of [[air elemental]]s.
